tls-transport-enabled.title: Enable TLS transport
tls-transport-enabled.description: Enable TLS transport for incoming data

bind.title: Bind address
bind.description: Bind address on which to listen for incoming data

port.title: Port
port.description: Port on which to listen for incoming data

tag-prefix.title: Tag prefix
tag-prefix.description: Prefix that will be added to an incoming event's tag

tag-match-pattern.title: Tag matching pattern
tag-match-pattern.description: Tag pattern used by the match directive in the output plugin. See https://docs.fluentd.org/configuration/config-file#id-2.-match-tell-fluentd-what-to-do

wendelin-ingestion-url.title: Wendelin ingestion URL
wendelin-ingestion-url.description: Ingestion endpoint URL of the Wendelin Telecom instance to which the data is to be forwarded

username.title: Wendelin account username
username.description: The username of a valid account to authenticate with on the Wendelin instance

password.title: Wendelin account password
password.description: The password of the account to authenticate with on the Wendelin instance

flush-interval.title: Buffer flushing interval
flush-interval.description: Delay after which the data buffer is flushed to the output
